Name: Avalanche
Ingredients: 60 ml Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur
30 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
Instructions: BLEND ingredients with 12oz scoop of crushed ice. Pour into glass and serve with straws.
Review: Creamy, rich and smooth. Fluffy but lovely.
History: Created in 1979 at Maudes Bar, New York City, USA.
